nodes.text: Curtis was a Shistavanen male who worked as a bouncer for the cantina inside the Serendipity, a 1550-LEX yacht owned by Delia Leighton. Curtis was sympathetic towards the Rebel Alliance, and shortly after the Battle of Yavin, he assisted smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca in rescuing the rebel Shrike operative Caluan Ematt from Imperial forces on the planet Cyrkon.
Curtis first appeared in the canon junior novel Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure, which was written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
